Key.Original: Find more information about the SME.Gen mission in your diary!

SME.Gen - infantry focused COOP

SME.Gen is a infantry focused mission generator for COOP gameplay.
When a set of active missions is completed a new set will be genereated after some time. After completing a set of mission, you will be rewarded with a vehicle. There a three types of vehicle available (MobileHQ, MRAP, light attach Helicopter). Only one of those vehicles will be spawned on completion of a mission set. There won't be multiple instances of the same vehicle. Helicopters may have slot restirctions (admin decission). Completing a task will level up your rank. This will make better gear available in the Arsenal (if not disabled in the mission params).

Overview of special keys used by SME.Gen

[ F4 ] pressing F4 in the service area will start a full vehicle service

1PARA - public SME.Gen COOP server
